name: XJack Mod - 13 Effects Christmas Edition
description: XJack screensaver collection with 13 terminal-based effects including original XJack typing horror, Jesus Hooligan song lyrics (Back Room, Dogs & Motorbikes), system failure scenarios (System Error, Kernel Panic, BIOS Catastrophe, Network Apocalypse), hacker scenarios (Terminal Hacker, Hacked Terminal, Xtreme Hack), AI coding disaster (Vibe Code Fail), visual chaos (Symbol Storm), and role-based system failure (Crash Grammar). Features auto-scroll mode, title display toggle, and escalating visual effects.
features: AI coding disaster with 6 fix attempts

effects.name: Original XJack
effects.description: Classic 'All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy' typing with psychological tension

effects.name: Back Room
effects.description: Jesus Hooligan's haunting song about death and the back room

effects.name: Dogs & Motorbikes
effects.description: Jesus Hooligan's anthem about dogs, motorbikes, and three people

effects.name: System Error
effects.description: Fast escalating system failure: Warning -> Critical -> Cascade -> Meltdown -> Reboot

effects.name: Symbol Storm
effects.description: ASCII character chaos with rainbow colors and typing animation

effects.name: Terminal Hacker
effects.description: Realistic coding session with matrix rain execution phase

effects.name: Hacked Terminal
effects.description: Normal work session gets hijacked by hacker with system destruction

effects.name: Xtreme Hack
effects.description: 7 different hacker scenarios cycling every 30 seconds

effects.name: Kernel Panic
effects.description: System attempts recovery, fails, shows human panic, then freezes forever

effects.name: Crash Grammar
effects.description: Role-based system failure with escalating phases and memory decay

effects.name: Vibe Code Fail
effects.description: AI coding assistant creates flight simulator that progressively gets worse through 6 fix attempts, ending in OS deletion

effects.name: Net Apocalypse
effects.description: XScreensNet infrastructure collapse from normal monitoring to complete network apocalypse

effects.name: BIOS Catastrophe
effects.description: Hardware failure from normal POST to complete motherboard meltdown with maximum screen corruption
